channel.title: How To Make Custom Animations [Repost]
channel.description:
I Posted this in the wrong section so yeh, [Repost]
So, I know how to make my own animations, but you guys might not. So, I decided to show you guys [b][i]HOW TO MAKE YOUR OWN ANIMATIONS.[/b][/u]
[b]Dufficulty: 2/10
Files used: class23.java, client.java(server)
Files needed: RSMV, Metasequoia[/b]
Step 1:
You need Metasequoia.
First, open metasequoia and make an animation such as, 3 lines parallel to eachother.
Step 2:
Save the metasequoia file as 50000 and make it a .dat file
Step 3:
Put the 50000.dat file in the MODELS folder of your client.
Step 4:
In class23.java in your client add the int
[code] case 656: // This is the GFX ID change to w/e originalDataID = 2910; //This is the original ID that was in client.java in the server file gfx.anInt405 = 2911; //This is the new Id that you will add in the client.java server file break; [/code]
Step 5:
Add "656" to your client.java (server) under the weapon you want that to be, such as 4151 (whip)
Step 6:
[code] if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 1658); stillgfx(341, EnemyY, EnemyX); } [/code]
Change that to
[code] if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 1658); stillgfx(656, EnemyY, EnemyX); } [/code]
Step 7:
Where it says "656" that is your gfx, meaning that if you want it can be ice barrage
Step 8:
Add the GFX in a notes pad that way you know what animation it is.
Step 9:
Compile your server, and say "C ya later noob."
Step 10:
After the server is done compiling, log on and use whip special.
Step 11:
TADA! New whip animation made by you!
[NOTE]-If your too lazy to make your own animations, theres some animations if you run rsmv for a while.
credits- 100% me :)
- wolf
[NOTE]- I tested this on Wl, Delta, Dodian(Delta is dodian) all worked so you should have no problem really.
[NOTE]- Don't make GAY animations like my one friend...He made it when you use sara gs boobs come out...

item.title: How To Make Custom Animations [Repost]
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

I Posted this in the wrong section so yeh, [Repost]

So, I know how to make my own animations, but you guys might not. So, I decided to show you guys [i]HOW TO MAKE YOUR OWN ANIMATIONS.[/u]

[b]Dufficulty: 2/10

Files used: class23.java, client.java(server)

Files needed: RSMV, Metasequoia[/b]

Step 1:

You need Metasequoia.

First, open metasequoia and make an animation such as, 3 lines parallel to eachother.

Step 2:

Save the metasequoia file as 50000 and make it a .dat file

Step 3:

Put the 50000.dat file in the MODELS folder of your client.

Step 4:

In class23.java in your client add the int

case 656: // This is the GFX ID change to w/e
originalDataID = 2910; //This is the original ID that was in client.java in the server file
gfx.anInt405 = 2911; //This is the new Id that you will add in the client.java server file
break;

Step 5:

Add “656” to your client.java (server) under the weapon you want that to be, such as 4151 (whip)

Step 6:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 1658);
stillgfx(341, EnemyY, EnemyX);
}

Change that to

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 1658);
stillgfx(656, EnemyY, EnemyX);
}

Step 7:

Where it says “656” that is your gfx, meaning that if you want it can be ice barrage

Step 8:

Add the GFX in a notes pad that way you know what animation it is.

Step 9:

Compile your server, and say “C ya later noob.”

Step 10:

After the server is done compiling, log on and use whip special.

Step 11:

TADA! New whip animation made by you!

[NOTE]-If your too lazy to make your own animations, theres some animations if you run rsmv for a while.

credits- 100% me

  • wolf

[NOTE]- I tested this on Wl, Delta, Dodian(Delta is dodian) all worked so you should have no problem really.

[NOTE]- Don’t make GAY animations like my one friend…He made it when you use sara gs boobs come out…

Read full topic
